resp = client.esql.query(
    query="\nFROM library\n| EVAL year = DATE_EXTRACT(\"year\", release_date)\n| WHERE page_count > ? AND match(author, ?, {\"minimum_should_match\": ?})\n| LIMIT 5\n",
    params=[
        300,
        "Frank Herbert",
        2
    ],
)
print(resp)
